articles.title: WhatsApp Rival Telegram Launches Its Paid Premium Service: Check the Details - The Quint
articles.description: Telegram Premium is the new feature of the WhatApp rival. This will allow users to download files up to 4GB in size, use lots of new stickers, create longer bios, convert voice messages into texts, and much more.
articles.content:
The roll out of Telegram's paid premium services will benefit the users in the following ways:
  • Premium users will be able to get double benefits of everything compared to non-subscribers.
